Flew to Paris. Stayed a week. Better mask wearing and general community respect for Covid there. Plane, trains, cars, metros, restaurants. All of it. We have plenty of room for improvement here.

For a long-haul flight, comfy clothes are the only way to go.

But what's your go-to outfit for several hours on a plane? Joggers? A multi-purpose shawl? Sleep mask and ear plugs?

Let us know your top tips below 👇 #longhaul #traveltips #comfy https://t.co/XCaUKOHgoI
